text: Barclay Square in 1860 Barclay Square in 2007 Barclay Square () is a public square and park in the city of Tartu, Estonia, adjacent to the Ülikooli street. It is named after Michael Andreas Barclay de Tolly and there is a large monument in the park honoring him. title: Barclay Square
